history.content:
<md>Hello! My name is Saumya and myself and a team of 4 others are establishing a new club on campus called Data Science for Social Good (DSSG). We aim to apply data science to nonprofits, medical centers, startups, and more with an emphasis on social good sectors such as health, education, sustainability, and racial equity.

As we are planning our Consulting committee, we are looking for PROJECT MANAGERS with strong technical skills in data science, ML, NLP, etc. as well as project management skills. A PM would be in direct contact with the client, involved in the technical development of the project, and responsible for managing a group of individuals to complete the client's deliverables.

If you’d like to learn more about DSSG and the role, please feel free to reach out to me at saumyachoudhary@berkeley.edu or pulkitb124@berkeley.edu!</md>
history.subject: Project Manager Position for New Club on Campus
